entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:53 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 10:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
